column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This place was very good. It was not worthy of a 1 month prior reservation. Very dark inside
column2: which I liked. Made the ambience romantic. Crab/Avacado salad was our favorite. Tomato/Bacon salad was dull. We had a cheap item on the menu
column3: the steak sandwich and that was delicious. Â Overall a good experience
column5: but I wouldn't hesitate to go back.
